item.title: CVE-2024-27997|2024-03-19T16:49:03.277Z -- Visualcomposer -- Visual Composer Website Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Visualcomposer Visual Composer Website Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Visual Composer Website Builder: from n/a through 45.6.0.
